text: Sean Horan is a New Zealand rugby union and sevens coach. He coached the New Zealand women's national rugby sevens team. He was appointed as head coach in 2012. He previously coached the Bay of Plenty Steamers, in the ITM Cup, from 2009 till his shocking departure in 2011. Horan's first achievement as Head Coach was winning the 2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens in Russia. In 2016 he helped New Zealand qualify for the 2016 Summer Olympics. He stepped down as coach for the New Zealand women's sevens team after the 2016 Olympics. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:New Zealand rugby union coaches Category:Rugby sevens in New Zealand Category:New Zealand Olympic coaches Category:New Zealand national rugby sevens team coaches
title: Sean Horan
